name: hbxfrbi
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)
-| wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)
-| wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)

comment: A utility lemma to transfer a bound-variable hypothesis builder into a definition. See ~ hbxfreq for equality version. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)
